articles.author: Sam McNeil, Jon Gambrell
articles.title: EU lists Iran's paramilitary Revolutionary Guard as terrorist organization over protest crackdown - AP News
articles.description: The European Union has agreed to list Iran’s paramilitary Revolutionary Guard as a terrorist organization over Tehran’s bloody crackdown on nationwide protests. The bloc’s top diplomat made the announcement Thursday. It is a largely symbolic move that adds to…
articles.content: BRUSSELS (AP) The European Union agreed Thursday to list Irans paramilitary Revolutionary Guard as a terrorist organization over Tehrans bloody crackdown on nationwide protests, the blocs top diploma… [+7258 chars]
